wm-license-cc-conditions:

Bɛ tebea ahodoɔ a edidi soɔ yi mu he:
wm-license-cc-conditions-attribution-hea: Nkyerɛkyerɛmu a yɛgyina suahunu so de ma biribi
wm-license-cc-conditions-attribution-tex: Ɛsɛ sɛ bɛde anuonyam a bɛfata ma, bɛde tumi krataa he ho link ma, na bɛkyerɛ sɛ bɛayɛ nsakrae anaa. Bɛ betumi ayɛ saa wɔ ɔkwan biara a ntease wom so, nanso ɛnyɛ ɔkwan biara so a ɛkyerɛ sɛ nea bɛde tumi krataa he ma no foa wo anaa nea bɛde di dwuma he so.
